summary: Switzerland  is a small country in Western Europe.
full_text: The Federal Charter or Letter of Alliance  documents the Eternal Alliance or League of the Three Forest Cantons , the union of three cantons in what is now central Switzerland. It is dated in early August, 1291 and initiates the current August 1 national Swiss holiday. This agreement cites a previous  similar pact. It is currently exhibited at the archives of the Swiss Charters of Confederation in Schwyz.
title: Federal Charter
